stories.original_summary: Einstein’s claim that the speed of light is constant has survived more than a century of scrutiny—but scientists are still daring to test it. stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Challenge Ancient Rule of Light-Sparks!
stories.fantasy_story: For generations, Elder Wizard Elara's wisdom about the constant speed of light-sparks has held true. Yet, daring wizards from the Arcane College are now testing this very law. They track powerful cosmic light-sparks from distant realms, hoping to uncover if light's speed might shift under extreme magical energies.

stories.original_headline: A quantum discovery that breaks the rules of heating
stories.original_summary: When scientists repeatedly drove a strongly interacting quantum system with laser “kicks,” they expected it to heat up and grow chaotic. stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Discover Cool-Down Magic, Defying Heat!
stories.fantasy_story: Alchemists, experimenting with tiny magical particles, expected them to become unstable when struck by energy bursts. Surprisingly, the particles refused to absorb more magic, locking into a harmonious dance instead. This strange effect, born from arcane balance, prevents them from ever growing chaotic, revealing a new secret of enchantment.

stories.original_headline: Xbox’s Towerborne is switching from a free-to-play game to a paid one
stories.original_summary: Towerborne, a side-scrolling action RPG published by Xbox Game Studios that has been available in early access, will officially launch on February 26th. stories.fantasy_headline: Towerborne Chronicle Now Costs Gold, No Longer Free!
stories.fantasy_story: The Scroll-Weavers' Guild's famed 'Towerborne' enchanted chronicle, whispered about for some time, is set for its grand unveiling. Initially, it was believed that anyone could experience it for free, demanding only a constant magical link. However, the Guild has declared it will now cost gold coins to acquire, though it can be enjoyed without a continuous magical connection.

stories.original_headline: The best Apple Watch to buy
stories.original_summary: If you have an iPhone, the Apple Watch is the best smartwatch for you. But there was only one Apple Watch when the smartwatch launched in 2015. stories.fantasy_headline: Choosing Your Perfect Chronos-Orb: A Guild Guide.
stories.fantasy_story: For those possessing a Whisperstone, the Chronos-Orb is the finest enchanted time-teller available. A decade ago, only one such orb existed, but now the Enchanters' Guild offers three distinct designs. There's the humble Apprentice's Orb, the standard Journeyman's Orb, and the sturdy Master's Orb, each suited for different adventurers.
